overview: More of Ringo's Dynamite!  Exceptional Japanese chanteuse Shiina Ringo is musically charged once more leading the Tokyo Incidents to a triumphant live spectacle. Filled to the brim with their absorbing tunes, this release offers overall 22 hits including "Eki mae" ("In front of the station"), "Sabisu" ("Service"), "Kokoro" ("Heart") as well as the brand new smash hits "Transparent World" (written by Kameda Seiji with lyrics by Ringo) + "Superstar" plus more! No true fan should miss this spectacular music extravaganza!
title: Dynamite Out
